text: By Michael Kole Oct 16, 2015 If the last season failures of EPL or recent copa America's grey season is scaring you to bet on betting sites in Nigeria, chances are you haven't played with the right scheme. There is no definition of the word "Fortune or "Hard Luck", when it comes to serious betting. Early depictions, watching rare upsets, analyzing verdicts through skill comparison and home-side advantage are inclusive factors that surmise your chances of winning a bet. Its never easy to keep a winning streak on these sites, especially when the game on real grounds goes to the wire. But, with rightful patience, agility, common sense and some of these tips, one can increase its chances to be a fortune teller at betting sites in Nigeria. Put your heart in it, but don't play emotional Coming on a tilt, after a series of losses will never help your further luck or bet. So, take a quick break, sip a deep wine, take a long walk and don't bet until your mind has came back to grounds. Make a wise bet, which has more chances to be true and check if its your day or not. Keep your feet in different boats This might not sound a good strategy in real life, but virtual betting demands it. For example : if you are receiving 5 points for 1 on one site chances are, you might find a bid of 4 points on another ledger. Make your calculations quick and start bidding for a low but safe revenue. Without a Risk, People have earned in bulk per day, with this strategy alone. Keep staring what's going on the pitch I am not talking about the present clash. You must do your homework for analyzing past performances and results of a team before betting. By knowing what's going on and off the pitch, your instinct will work far better and can win you more dollars per hour. Different Leagues, different Masters This may sound precarious, but registering on a specific portal which offer better bids for one particular type of league is mindful. Once you know which portal is winning most money for a respective league. Make multiple accounts and play simultaneously on both, this will double your chances to win on a good day and will be a great cushion on a bad day. Your chances to lose on both the portals are far less than playing on a single portal with different leagues. These are few of the many tips I apply for betting sites in Nigeria.
